step1.howItWorks1: Secret Santa is a fun gift exchange where each person is randomly assigned to buy a gift for someone else in the group. Nobody knows who has who until the big reveal! Not even the organizer.
step1.howItWorks2: This app makes it super easy: just enter everyone's names and contact info, and we'll automatically create secret links for each person. When they click their link, they'll see who they're buying a gift for.
step1.howItWorks3: You'll be able to send each person their secret link via email or SMS, and you can track who has bought their gift in the admin dashboard.
